comment: The FBI arrested Michael Miselis, Ben Daly, and other members of the Rise Above movement for "conspiracy to riot", but no Antifa. The only conspiracy here is a government one. This is fully thanks to the Wall Street funded Pro Publica portrayal of the group. This is a serious escalation in political repression. The media and finance class runs the USA
